text:
Created attachment 22735
Add missing OCSP Content-Type header.

The Content-Type header is missing in the OCSP request code. This causes some responders to reject the requests. This requirement is detailed in RFC2560 A.1.1 .
creator: steve@openssl.org
steve@openssl.org
text:
Created attachment 22736
Corrected patch this time.... ;-)

text: Thanks for the patch. Committed to trunk as r704917 (http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=704917&view=rev).
